```{r}
#| label = "DataNamePlot",
#| fig.cap = "Plot of ResponseName versus PredictorName with fitted
#| line added for each FactorName."
library(ggplot2)
DataName |> ggplot(aes(y=ResponseName, x=PredictorName)) + geom.point() + geom_smooth(method="lm")
```

```{r}
#| label = "DataName.lm"
DataName.lm = lm(ResponseName ~ PredictorName, data=DataName)
library(broom)
DataName.lm.aug = augment(DataName.lm)
summary(DataName.lm)
```


```{r}
#| label = "glanceDataName.lm"
glance(DataName.lm) |> kable(caption="Summary statistics for DataName.lm.")
```

```{r}
#| label = "plotDataName.lm",
#| fig.cap = "Residual analysis for DataName.lm"
library(ggfortify)
autoplot(DataName.lm)
```
